txt.en: 'Excellent roaring, [placeholder]! I expect no less from my own kin!'
'Excellent roaring, [placeholder]! If I did not know better, I would think you were secretly a Beorning yourself! But of course that cannot be.'
<rgb=#FF00FF>Roar</rgb> at a cowardly goblin at Evrul's Home

'I smell more goblins here, [placeholder]. They must be waiting for the homes to be emptied, so they can break in and take anything that isn't nailed down! Find them, and we will show them how mighty we are! We will give them a big Beorning <rgb=#FF00FF>ROAR</rgb> and send them fleeing!'
'Eeee!'
'Aieee!'
Talk to Langhár
Roared at cowardly goblins ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Nooooo!'
Cowardly goblins are lurking in the forest near the homes of Woodmen. They wait patiently for their chance to break in and steal whatever they can.
Let Them Hear Your Roar
Cowardly goblins can be found in the forest near the Woodmen homes.\n\nFind them and <rgb=#FF00FF>roar</rgb> at them!
<rgb=#FF00FF>Roar</rgb> at a cowardly goblin at Hodver's Home
TBD
TBD

Langhár can be summoned to your side with Langhár's summoning horn.

You should talk to Langhár.

If Langhár is no longer with you, she may be outside Waldfast or in Vegbár.
